Compliance & Safety

Our Commitment

At Free AI Tools, we are dedicated to creating and maintaining a safe, respectful, and compliant platform for all users. Our primary goal is to provide a valuable resource for discovering open-source AI models while ensuring the content presented is appropriate for a general audience, including students, researchers, and professionals.

Content Filtering Policy

Our platform is fully automated. We utilize scripts to fetch data from public sources like Hugging Face and GitHub. A critical part of this process is our content filtering system.

  • Automated NSFW Filtering: Our scripts are designed to identify and exclude models and tools that are tagged with or contain descriptions related to "Not Safe For Work" (NSFW), explicit, or adult themes. We maintain a blocklist of keywords to ensure this filtering is as effective as possible.
  • Best-Effort Basis: While we strive for 100% accuracy, automated filtering has its limitations. The AI landscape is vast and constantly changing, and occasionally, inappropriate content may slip through. We operate on a best-effort basis and are continually improving our filtering algorithms.

Reporting & Takedown

Community vigilance is essential to keeping our platform safe. If you encounter any model or content that you believe violates our safety policy or is otherwise inappropriate, we encourage you to report it.

The most effective way to report an issue is by creating an issue on our official GitHub repository. Please provide a link to the content in question and a brief description of why you believe it should be reviewed. We take all reports seriously and will act promptly to investigate and, if necessary, remove the content.

About Compliance
